00013       void EventDispatcher::DispatchEvent( Event* evt )
00014       {
00015             for( SLList<Listener>::Iter i = mListeners.Begin( ); i.IsValid( ); i++ )
00016             {
00017                   if( (*i).mEventType == evt->mType )
00018                         (*i).mListener->EventHandler( evt );
00019             }
00020       };
00021 
00022       void EventDispatcher::AddListener( EventType::EventType type, EventListener* handler )
00023       {
00024             Listener lstnr = { type, handler };
00025             mListeners.PushBack( lstnr );
00026       };
